name: Modern 2BD in downtown Boston, washer/dryer
description:
Gorgeous 2BD/2BA Unit in the heart of Boston - Downtown. Professionally managed and cleaned with stylish kitchen, free high-speed wifi and 24/7 support. Fully stocked with all the convenience you would expect at a hotel.

Guest access

Other things to note
Located in the heart of Bostons financial district, you are just a couple blocks away from the Boston Common gardens and a short walk from the federal reserve plaza. Whether you are here for work or vacation, you will be centrally located between the west end and the financial district.
